short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Measure Pixels in your New tab of chrome browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Search results will be provided by Microsoft Bing.

Utilize the Measure Pixels extension to meticulously measure and adjust elements within the banner you are tasked with designing.

Measure Pixels extension serves as an invaluable tool in a multitude of fields and professions, offering precision and accuracy that are essential for various tasks. In graphic design, professionals , who work at digital marketing agencies, can use ‘Measure Pixels’ extension to ensure that their creations meet the highest standards of visual excellence.
This extension allows you to check resolution settings, ensuring optimal loading speed without sacrificing image quality. You can also use it to verify alignment, ensuring that every element is perfectly positioned, and test the banner's responsiveness across various screen sizes.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Measure Pixels extension and setting Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy
 
Uninstall Instructions: https://www.measurepixels.com/uninstall.html
EULA/Terms of Use - https://www.measurepixels.com/terms.html
Privacy Policy - https://www.measurepixels.com/policy.html
Contact Us: http://www.measurepixels.com/terms.html#terms-contact

To remove our extension from Google Chrome:
 
1) Click on the three horizontal lines icon in the upper right-hand corner of your Chrome browser.
2) Go to "Settings".
3) In the menu that appears click on "Extensions".
4) From the list of installed Extensions, find the name of the toolbar extension you wish to uninstall.
5) Click on the trash can icon to the right of "Enable" (for the toolbar extension you wish to uninstall).
6) Close your browser completely and reopen it. Our toolbar extension should be removed from your Chrome browser.
